      • of

        public static ChatQuestionAnswer of(org.spongepowered.api.text.Text name,
                                    java.util.function.Consumer<org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.player.Player> action)
        Factory method for creating an answer.
        Parameters:
        name - The display-text of this answer. This will be shown to the player as a clickable text object.
        action - The result of this answer. This will be executed in the event that the player clicks this answer.
        Returns:
        The answer.

      • getText
